item.title: Linear Algebra
item.description: Linear Combination We have 3 vectors a , b , c . If we connect each vector from head to tail, we get the sum of the vectors, vector d. We can stretch and shrink a , b , and c , to get many different vectors. If you take all of the possible combinations of stretching and shrinking a , b , c , all the resulting vectors are called the linear combination of a,b and c.
